author: Joseph Young
title: We Ignored This Chilling 2007 Warning of a Bat-Diet Coronavirus Pandemic
description: A 2007 study published by researchers at Hong Kong University precisely predicted the reemergence of a coronavirus outbreak from bats. The post We Ignored This Chilling 2007 Warning of a Bat-Diet Coronavirus Pandemic appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Studies in the early 2000s warned bats can cause the reemergence of the coronavirus.
  • A study published in 2007 described the culture of eating bats as a ticking time bomb.
  • While some countries have made it illegal to trap bats, enforce… [+3395 chars]
